- In-unit High-end Washer & Dryer;
- New central air heating system; portable window AC is provided
- Spacious Bedrooms: This unit has two spacious bedrooms with a lot of natural light.
- Private Garage: with new garage door and automatic door opener;
- Electric-car
Ready: 110v and 220v dedicated outlets in garage ready to support EV car fast charger.
- Two Dedicated Parking Spaces: one in private garage and one tandem slot in front of garage.
Additional 5 street parkings in front of the building.
- Front and Back entrance doors: patio/balconies at front and back, brand new wood stairways.
- Low Cost of Living: No HOA Fee, No Garage & Sewage Fees.
Only pay for your own usage with separate utility meters.
Brand-new energy efficient windows and high-rating attic insulation.
